Questions.Question: According to the Testing Pyramid diagram, which layer should have the MOST tests?
Questions.Explanation: The pyramid shows Domain Unit Tests at the bottom labeled '(Many)'. The base of the testing pyramid should have the most tests.

Questions.Question: According to the Testing Pyramid diagram, which layer should have the FEWEST tests?
Questions.Explanation: The pyramid shows E2E Tests at the top labeled '(Few)'. End-to-end tests are expensive and should be used sparingly.

Questions.Question: What are the four layers of the Testing Pyramid shown in the diagram?
Options: E2E Tests, Integration Tests, Use Case Tests, Domain Unit Tests
White box, Black box, Gray box, Clear box
Questions.Explanation: The diagram shows four layers: E2E Tests (Few), Integration Tests (Some), Use Case Tests (More), and Domain Unit Tests (Many).
